item.description:
It's the first PechaKucha night of the year.

If you haven't heard of this global yet unpronounceable phenomenon, Pecha Kucha is a monthly format for sharing ideas, in which presenters are allotted 20 slides and 20 seconds per slide. Put simply: 6 minutes and 40 seconds of adult-style show & tell. It began in Tokyo in 2003, has since spread to over 463 cities worldwide, and first landed in Providence in March of 09.


The theme for this month is Beginnings

Besides providing some entertaining presentations, it's a great opportunity to network or just meet up with those you already know as the first hour is dedicated to socializing.

This month's venue is the Comedy Connection in East Providence.

Remember:

***Doors open at 7:20, presentations start at 8:20, and shmoozing goes down throughout.***

So come on down for what should be a fun night.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us, we should be easy to find
item.name: Providence PechaKucha night #46
